Articles.Content: I'm getting the 502 also, oh well no release yet, up a tree with me then. See you all on the other side when I get down.

> 
> Is this the record for hype train threads?

The HYPE TRAIN has long ago left them behind
Must...go...faster!
I just can't work now, but running out of coffee. Just tell us release date +/- 1 hour, don't make my life miserable.
I thought Maxmaps saying crossing the Ts and dotting the lower case js was just him putting a hispanic flavor to the saying.
are you guys ready? 400 PAGES HERE WE GOOOO
Bad gateways appear to have stopped.
please squaaaaaaaaaad!!!!!!!!!!!

> 
> I'm getting the 502 also, oh well no release yet, up a tree with me then. See you all on the other side when I get down.

I hope it will be out by then.
Hype hype hype!
HYPE PLEASE RELEASE aaaaaaa

Wow, my iPad just crashed, completely shutdown.

Didn't catch on fire.

More hype.

> 
> Suppose to be getting a current event in school, I find it better to hype to the extreme

The release of 1.0 isn't a current event?
Im back
Do hype moar!
Yeah, the forum spasm seems to have stopped.
512 pages or riot.

*Last Depot Update about 21 hours ago (April 26, 2015 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 18:40:24 UTC)*

Looking at this makes me sad. Squad stopped updating experimentals branch in Steam almost day ago ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Maxmaps tweeted- Crossing t's and dotting lower case j's, this has to be a clue!

j is tenth in the alphabet and he tweeted that an hour ago and ...... my head is full of hype... where did my thought go?

Could this be related?

[http://security.stackexchange.com/questions/49131/have-i-crossed-my-ts-and-dotted-my-lower-case-js-or-implementing-aes-pleas](http://security.stackexchange.com/questions/49131/have-i-crossed-my-ts-and-dotted-my-lower-case-js-or-implementing-aes-pleas)
get.. MORE... HYYYYYYYPPPPPPEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!

Deploy the HYPESNAIL!
